name: Admivo
tag_list: advertising, web-advertising, simple, competitive, marketing, blogs, websites, publishers, advertisers
overview:
Admivo is a web advertising network founded in late 2010 that aims to bring simpler, more fair, and more effective to both advertisers and publishers alike within the online advertising industry. Admivo was founded by Alex Colquhoun, who still remains the CEO of the company.

Admivo is making partnerships with numerous websites and publishers, such as blogs, as well as many different advertisers to start a more community-based web advertising environment, to make it simpler and more effective between the businesses advertising on the internet.

It’s the easy, effective, fair & simple way to advertise online. Express your interest or signup within minutes at admivo.com!
